name: .DA2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .DA2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A DA2 file is a data file created by HammerTap DeepAnalysis, a program used to research eBay auctions. It contains a list of auction results, buyer and seller information, and other sales data. Sellers use DA2 files to analyze sales data and generate reports.

content: HammerTap DeepAnalysis, which was renamed to just HammerTap, was an eBay market research tool that sellers used to gather and analyze sales activity for various items and categories of items. After using DeepAnalysis to retrieve data, sellers could save that data as a DA2 file, so they could load and review the data again in the future.

instructions: You can open a DA2 file with HammerTap (formerly known as HammerTap DeepAnalysis). HammerTap is no longer available for purchase, so if you do not already have HammerTap installed, you may not be able to open your DA2 file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
